text: Fox Sports 1 is an American pay television channel. It is owned by the Fox Sports Media Group, a unit of Fox Corporation. It replaced the motorsports network Speed on August 17, 2013. It airs an array of live sporting events, including Major League Baseball, World Baseball Classic, college sports, soccer matches, and a variety of motorsports events. ==References== Category:American television channels Category:2013 establishments in the United States
title: Fox Sports 1
